title: Align pricing copy across landing, pricing, and dashboard to Free=10 invoices/mo and Pro=₹299 unlimited

requirements.summary: Update Landing and Pricing pages to state Free plan includes 10 invoices/month (replace 5).
acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx`, the Free plan feature list shows '10 invoices per month' instead of '5 invoices per month'.
On `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx`, any mentions of '5 invoices per month' (features section and pricing preview section) are updated to '10 invoices per month'.
No remaining UI text in these pages claims the Free plan is limited to 5 invoices/month.

file_operations.description: Replace the Free plan feature text '5 invoices per month' with '10 invoices per month' in the Free plan feature list while keeping all user-facing text in English and leaving shadcn/ui components untouched.

Update all Free plan mentions of '5 invoices per month' to '10 invoices per month' in both the Features section description and the Pricing Preview Free plan list, ensuring consistent wording across the page.

requirements.summary: Update dashboard Free plan limit messaging to reflect 10 invoices/month.
acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx`, the Free plan usage string '(3/5 invoices used this month)' is updated so the denominator reflects a 10-invoice/month Free plan (e.g., '(3/10 invoices used this month)' if keeping the same placeholder usage count).
No other dashboard text contradicts the '10 invoices/month' Free plan limit.

file_operations.description: Update the Subscription Status banner text to replace '(3/5 invoices used this month)' with a 10-invoice/month denominator (e.g., '(3/10 invoices used this month)') and scan nearby dashboard copy for any conflicting Free plan limit wording.

requirements.summary: Ensure Pro plan copy stays consistent: ₹299/month and Unlimited invoices on Landing and Pricing pages.
acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx`, Pro plan continues to display ₹299/month and 'Unlimited invoices'.
On `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx`, Pro plan continues to display ₹299/month and 'Unlimited invoices'.
No user-facing Pro plan copy in these pages contradicts 'Unlimited invoices' or the ₹299/month price.

file_operations.description: Audit and normalize any Pro plan user-facing copy on this page to ensure it consistently states '₹299/month' and 'Unlimited invoices' (no functional/payment-flow changes; keep English-only text).

Audit and normalize any Pro plan user-facing copy on this page (pricing preview and related CTAs) so it consistently states '₹299/month' and 'Unlimited invoices' without introducing new routes or modifying restricted hook/UI files.
